channel.title: linux on Welcome | Mariel's GitHub page
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Welcome | Mariel's GitHub page

item.title: The path to Linux via Ubuntu MATE
item.description: So this is me updating this blog from my Linux machine. It’s an old laptop from around 2014 that I bought for finishing my bachelor’s thesis. So far so good, yet not quite the same as doing this from Windows. It’s been a fun adventure.
